::Feline::

She smiled at HotRod.  She realized she was dealing with abot with a 
one track mind.  She figured she would of had to give in sooner or 
later. But then again, why not mix work with pleasure.  She kissed 
HotRod. Then whispered to him,"Yours."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He thought.
> "Hmmm. Your room, or mine?"
